html: These students have experienced extraordinary challenges after the 2016 flood. We don’t need to exacerbate that or make it worse by also taking resources away from our schools. Disaster recovery reform to give south Louisiana schools millions in aidhttp://www.wafb.com/2018/10/04/disaster-recovery-reform-give-south-louisiana-schools-millions-aid/ …
text:
These students have experienced extraordinary challenges after the 2016 flood. We don’t need to exacerbate that or make it worse by also taking resources away from our schools.

html: La is battling the largest historical, ongoing and prospective loss of coastal wetlands and it’s a national crisis. Diverting our energy $ away from efforts to improve our resiliency is a fundamentally flawed approach to addressing the maintenance backlog in national parks.
text: La is battling the largest historical, ongoing and prospective loss of coastal wetlands and it’s a national crisis.  Diverting our energy $ away from efforts to improve our resiliency is a fundamentally flawed approach to addressing the maintenance backlog in national parks.

html: The bill was considered today in conjunction with the Restore Our Parks and Public Lands Act, which proposed using Gulf offshore energy revenues to address the maintenance backlog of the National Park Service and other agencies across the country.
text: The bill was considered today in conjunction with the Restore Our Parks and Public Lands Act, which  proposed using Gulf offshore energy revenues to address the maintenance  backlog of the National Park Service and other agencies across the  country.

html: Our bill, H.R. 6771 amends the Gulf of Mexico Energy Security Act 2006 (GOMESA) to bring Gulf offshore energy revenue sharing in line with levels that onshore energy producing states enjoy – an effort long pursued by Louisiana’s congressional delegation.
text: Our bill,   H.R. 6771 amends the Gulf of Mexico Energy Security Act 2006 (GOMESA) to bring Gulf offshore energy revenue sharing in line with levels that onshore  energy producing states enjoy – an effort long pursued by Louisiana’s  congressional delegation.

html: 4. ACA RELIEF. Finally, in the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act we were able to repeal the crippling "individual mandate" embedded in the Affordable Care Act. This was a totally unfair tax, it was ineffective, and people shouldn't be forced to buy government-mandated health insurance.
text: 4. ACA RELIEF. Finally, in the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act we were able to repeal the crippling "individual mandate" embedded in the Affordable Care Act. This was a totally unfair tax, it was ineffective, and people shouldn't be forced to buy government-mandated health insurance.

html: 3. The new tax code doubles the Child Tax Credit from $1,000 to $2,000, which helps people all across the country care for their family, while also protecting the Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit and Adoption Credit. This is great news for families.
text: 3. The new tax code doubles the Child Tax Credit from $1,000 to $2,000, which helps people all across the country care for their family, while also protecting the Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit and Adoption Credit. This is great news for families.

html: 2. The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act nearly DOUBLED the standard deduction. Specifically, the new tax code will increase the standard deduction from $12,000 to $24,000 for married couples, which will protect more folks' income from being taxed. #TaxDay #TaxCutsandJobsAct
text: 2. The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act nearly DOUBLED the standard deduction. Specifically, the new tax code will increase the standard deduction from $12,000 to $24,000 for married couples, which will protect more folks' income from being taxed. #TaxDay #TaxCutsandJobsAct

html: Project efficiency is not limited to highways. The West Shore flood control project was in the STUDY phase for 42 years before proposed for construction. And construction still hasn't started.
text: Project efficiency is not limited to highways. The West Shore flood control project was in the STUDY phase for 42 years before proposed for construction.  And construction still hasn't started.

html: The fact that we call the Mississippi River bridge that was built before I was born as "new" is the best indicator that something needs to change.
text: The fact that we call the Mississippi River bridge that was built before I was born as "new" is the best indicator that something needs to change.

html: There is no doubt we need more money to support infrastructure in the capital region but we can't keep spending money in the same system that got us to this point.
text: There is no doubt we need more money to support infrastructure in the capital region but we can't keep spending money in the same system that got us to this point.

html: Brand new four lane roads in areas that don't have traffic don't make sense when there isn't enough investment in the capital region - some of the worst traffic in the US.
text: Brand new four lane roads in areas that don't have traffic don't make sense when there isn't enough investment in the capital region - some of the worst traffic in the US.

html: The current infrastructure prioritization system in place today is flawed. Project development needs to be metric based and objective.
text: The current infrastructure prioritization system in place today is flawed. Project development needs to be metric based and objective.

html: We don't have years of infrastructure investment to catch up on. We have decades.
text: We don't have years of infrastructure investment to catch up on. We have decades.

html: La wins in the bill: our flood and other disaster victims get the tax breaks we’ve fought for all year long, we preserved tax incentives uniquely critical for community development, historic preservation, economic reinvestment and higher education.

html: Finally, this bill helps eliminate the strategic advantage that foreign companies hold over America’s small biz by providing competitive tax rates. It provides opportunities for Americans by creating jobs here in our country not overseas and helps to increase $ for our families.
text: Finally, this bill helps eliminate the strategic advantage that foreign companies hold over America’s small biz by providing competitive tax rates. It provides opportunities for Americans by creating jobs here in our country not overseas and helps to increase $ for our families.

html: This bill will lower taxes across every income tax bracket, nearly double the standard deduction and give people back their freedom to make healthcare decisions without having to pay a government-imposed penalty and lifting some of the tax burden on our small businesses.
